Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Two people comment on the Australian government's actions in light of recent events. The first urges authorities to address the disadvantage faced by a group of people in an otherwise wealthy nation describing the next budget as an opportunity to do so. The second expresses concern over funding for AUKUS submarines given the release of a Welfare Report and the impending Budget suggesting that this does not look good. The use of hashtags and article links indicate that these posts have political undertones.
